scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a crowned figure, likely a saint or a royal personage, seated next to a wheel, holding a book. To the right, an angelic figure with wings offers a book to the seated figure. Behind them, a stylized city with towers and buildings is visible, set against a background of foliage and a radiating sun or divine light within an arched frame. The overall composition suggests a scene of divine inspiration or contemplation, possibly related to a saint's life or a biblical narrative.
